revision.text: Possibly: A System of Chronology, containing I. An explanation of the principles of this science ... II. A chronological history ... III. A list of several eclipses ... IV. A chronological list of Councils ... V. Chronological tables and charts ... VI. A list of remarkable events ... VII. Supplemental tables ... VIII. A ... biographical index, etc. (By James Playfair, D.D.). (Edinburgh, 1784). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/504230620
